Text:
(...Without grabbing the reins yourself, you can't
get a true sense of how to steer distribution.)

(It's easy for our lord and us Seven Shadows to zip
around from here to there, but...it's not like those
transporting our supplies can do the same.)

(As long as I'm doing business as the public face of
the company, I mustn't overlook the domain of those
we deal with publically.)

What can I say? Doing this sort of groundwork by
myself is lonelier than I expected.

Even if this task of carrying the goods and getting a
feel for transport doesn't require much hands-on
work, maybe I should've asked someone to tag along
with me.

Beta and Zeta are good at doing solo work. Maybe I
should ask them how they keep themselves occupied.
...Looks like I'm being targeted.

The more attractive the road, the more infested it is
with rogues.

I'd like to eventually use the power of our company
to take drastic measures in dealing with this sort of
thing,
but for now, I'll make steady work of them!

When you see a little lady carrying a load like that
all by herself in a place like this...

...don't ya think she's just begging to be robbed,
fellas?!
Yeah!

In a way, I envy your sheer ignorance not to suspect
a trap when confronted with a situation this convenient.
Yeah? Well, you ought to be envious.
You idiot! She's mocking you!
You sure?

That's exactly right! And you're all dying here—each
and every one of you!
Wh-What the heck? That's a big sword!

Hahah! Not sure what ya think you're doing, but
that's one goofy-looking stance!

Who're you calling "goofy-looking"?! You'll be sorry
once you taste my blade!

"You'll be sorry once you taste my blade!" Get a load
of that crap!
...You baaastard!
Wh-Wha—?!
Oof!
Gyaahhhh!!!
Owwww...
What the—? Did it hit someone?! Who's there?
Agh...ughh...!
Huh?!
Who the hell is this?!

Wait...did I...take out...someone completely
unrelated...?!

So you realized we were surveilling you... You're no
ordinary merchant woman, are you?!
...Heh. I'm grateful to hear you say that.
Grateful...?!

It looks like I didn't kill an innocent bystander
after all. You have no idea how worried I was.
What are you...blathering on about?

"Blathering on," he says... Who are you lot anyway?
You know this girl?
Yeah, you know her?
We'll deal with these bandits first! Sic 'em!
Grarrrr!
What the hell is that thing?!
Wolf! It's a wolf!
Eeeek!!!
Wh-What! What's going on?! Why's this happening?!

It looks like they also don't want to leave any
witnesses.

Well, I'm a little reluctant, but I guess I'll jump
on the bandwagon!
Wha—?! But I thought you were enemies!
Hyah!
Grrraaah!!!
Aaaaaghhh!!!

Why are my less enthusiastic attacks more effective
and accurate?!
Like I give a damn!

Why're you still holding the sword you just threw?!
Who the hell are you people?!
